oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Display in front of the Cossitt Library (2)
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Memphis Public Library & Information Center; Cossitt Library; libraries; Memphis, Tennessee;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A display on a trailer showing drawings of ancient figures encouraging all Memphians to use their public library. Display reads: "There are 80,000 books in Cossitt Library on every conceivable subject -- They belong to the people of Memphis. Are you using them -- Cossitt Library -- Free to all."
